translation: "Om sarimat (two together) ba (citation) ba mei sisipuṭa [kowtow*nar] rāya sahā (to be recited three times) All the sins accumulated over a hundred eons are removed with a single thought, like fire burning dry grass, and they are extinguished without remainder. All the bad actions I created in the past were caused by desire, anger, and delusion since beginningless time, and they arise from my body, speech, and thought.
